DOWNLOAD_INTRO:
You can download data from senseBoxes that you see on the map. Move or zoom the map to change your selection, then select a timeframe and phenomenon that you want to download. The file format is CSV, downloading the data might take some time.
If you choose to download aggregated data and not raw values mobile senseBoxes will not be included!
Daily data dumps can be found in our Archive.
DOWNLOAD_WARNING:
Downloading data from {{ count }} stations*
* Not all stations might have data in the selected time period. Use the Filter to find boxes and sensors that you want.
DOWNLOAD_NODATA: There is no data in the selected time frame.
